item.title: Creating a git Repo Remote
item.description: For over a year or so, I have been using a self-hosted Gitlab to host all of my private repos. For a few months now, I have been meaning to migrate my Gitlab repos to bare, minimal ones, hosted directly on a server. The majority of my code/configs are hosted publicly on my Github page, and it really doesn’t make sense to maintain a full Gitlab instance for the few (like…2) private repositories that I keep.
